effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: When your Shield Slam cooldown is reset by Strategist, you gain Expert Strategist, increasing the damage of Shield Slam by 5% and reducing all damage taken by 3% for 6 sec.
(4) Set: Shield Slam critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Thunder Clap and Revenge by 10% for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.4 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,103 Haste for 12 sec.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 8.9 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 767,247 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
